name: OwAn 1.1.3
description:
You've angered the all mighty Owan and are now locked in his house, your goal is to get out, but Owan and his friends will try to stop you. GET. OUT.

This game is most likely FILLED with bugs, please report them to me.

I made this game for a friend of mine, I asked what he wanted it to be like and he said "I dunno I just want to murder people", and this game was born. This was inspired mostly by UNKYS.exe, a game by Jayskibean, you really should go check it out!
